sourcesContent:
//component to display fetched data from server //Derick import React, { useState } from 'react' function ProductCard({ name, price, image, description, category, rating}){ const [isAddedToCart, setIsAddedToCart] = useState(true); function handleClick(){ setIsAddedToCart((isAddedToCart) => !isAddedToCart) } return( <>
{name}

Category: {category}

Price: Ksh {price}

Description: {description}

Rating: {rating}/5

) } export default ProductCard;
